translation.en: [Finan] For a hundred years, there was chaos in our lands.
translation.es: Durante cien años,hubo caos en nuestras tierras.

translation.en: War between Saxons and Dane invaders.
translation.es: Guerra entre sajones e invasores daneses.

translation.en: And war between men who wanted to be kings.
translation.es: Y guerra entre hombresque querían ser reyes.

translation.en: My lord, Uhtred, son of Uhtred, born a Saxon, but raised a Dane,
translation.es: Mi señor, Uhtred, hijo de Uhtred,nacido sajón, pero criado como danés,

translation.en: had brought about a fragile peace.
But as King Edward's health faltered,
translation.es: Pero la salud del rey Eduardo empeoró

translation.en: trouble spread.
And while most of the country was sworn to the Saxons,
translation.es: Y aunque la mayor parte del paíshabía jurado lealtad a los sajones,

translation.en: Uhtred's land of Northumbria was not.
translation.es: la tierra de Uhtred,Northumbria, no lo había hecho.

translation.en: And enemies were keen to exploit this.
Wolf!
Wolf! [grunts] Wolf!
Destroy the settlement. Leave no sign we have landed.
translation.es: Destruyan el asentamiento. No dejen señales de que atracamos.

translation.en: [warrior] Anlaf, we have the spy.
Behold my child.
Behold the daughter of Anlaf.
translation.es: Miren a la hija de Anlaf.

translation.en: You look ridiculous.
It is how they dress, Father. If I'm to hide amongst them, I must appear--
translation.es: Así se visten, padre.Si quiero esconderme, debo parecer…

translation.en: Is King Edward dead?
Not yet.
-But each breath could be his last. -Then we chose our moment.
translation.es: - Pero falta poco.- Entonces, es el mejor momento.

translation.en: A king dies, Saxons always turn on each other.
translation.es: Cuando el rey muere,los sajones siempre pelean entre sí.

translation.en: Pass this news to all kings who hate them.
translation.es: Díselo a los reyes que los odian.

translation.en: Tell them I have crossed from Irland and wish to make allies.
translation.es: Diles que he venido desde Irlanday quiero hacer aliados.

translation.en: Return yourself to Winchester.
Wait.
Play with them.
Unleash chaos.
[guard] No. Stay back.
[soldier] Find the queen!
[Aldhelm] Lady Eadgifu,
the traitor Aelfweard has sent men to take you and Prince Edmund into protection.
translation.es: el traidor Aelfweard envió hombresa protegerla a usted y al príncipe Edmund.

translation.en: I have no wish to be a hostage.
-Can we fight them? -Not without Aethelstan.
Well, surely, my guards can--
Loyalties are shifting and factions forming.
translation.es: Las lealtades han cambiadoy hay facciones.

translation.en: It is not certain who supports us.
We should flee with your son whilst we can.
translation.es: Huyamos con su hijo mientras podemos.

translation.en: [Eadgifu] I will not forgive this.
Nor forgive Aethelstan for leaving us exposed.
Damn him for his absence.
Come, Edmund. We are leaving.
-[soldier 1] Where's the queen? -[soldier 2] Move! Look everywhere!
-[Edmund] Mother, what's-- -[Eadgifu] Sh. Quiet.
-Wait. -[footsteps approaching]
-[Eadgifu] Pyrlig. -[Pyrlig] We got word.
Aethelstan has gone on pilgrimage to pray for his father's health.
translation.es: Aethelstan fue a peregrinary rezar por su padre.

translation.en: Then find him and tell him of his death.
translation.es: Encuéntrelo y avísele de su muerte.Luego, dele un golpe por mí.

translation.en: Then strike him, from me, for he swore to protect us.
translation.es: Encuéntrelo y avísele de su muerte.Luego, dele un golpe por mí. Porque juró protegernos.

translation.en: [Aldhelm grunts] Come. There's no time.
[Pyrlig] Where will you go?
-To Uhtred. -The pagan?
-[soldier] They're in here! -[Aldhelm] Go! Go!
[Eadgifu] Uhtred betrayed my husband.
Are we sure this is wise?
Uhtred was like a father to Aethelstan. He can be trusted.
translation.es: Uhtred era como un padrepara Aethelstan. Podemos confiar.

translation.en: We go to the last kingdom.
[Finan] He stood in front of the army, and he said, "Release the arrows!"
translation.es: Se paró frente al ejército y dijo:"¡Lancen las flechas!".

translation.en: And an arrow went right through his head.
translation.es: Y una le atravesó la cabeza.

translation.en: [Finan] Oh, that was something.
But then, the battle for this place certainly sticks in the memory.
translation.es: La batalla por este lugarha sido memorable.

translation.en: -Both times. -[Finan] Hey. Cnut.
He was a proper… cock!
Then there were the horse-killers. Oh, they were deadly.
translation.es: Luego, los asesinos de caballos.Eran mortales.

translation.en: -What was his name? -Bloodhair.
Bloodhair. And what was her name? She of the curses?
Do not remind me. [belches] Skade! Now, she was moon touched.
Another one who thought she was a seer. It didn't go well for her.
translation.es: Otra que creyó que era una vidente.No le fue bien.

translation.en: I am telling you, my dream was a prophecy. Three nights I have had it.
translation.es: Le digo que mi sueño fue una profecía.Lo he soñado tres noches.

translation.en: -And what is your dream, Ingrith? -[Finan] Don't get her started, Lord.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es su sueño, Ingrith?- No le dé cuerda, milord.

translation.en: -Hear my words. "Seven kings must die." -[man] Lord?
-Seven kings and-- -Ingrith!
All stand for the queen!
Queen Eadgifu.
And my most noble friend, Lord Aldhelm.
translation.es: Y mi más noble amigo, lord Aldhelm.

translation.en: What brings you this far north?
I come seeking refuge with my son.
Edward, rightful king of these lands, has died.
translation.es: Eduardo, el rey legítimode estas tierras, ha muerto.

translation.en: Then my heart grieves.
I'd hoped to reconcile.
One down, six to go.
No! I do not like it.
Northumbria recognizes the new king, Aethelstan.
Do not assume Aethelstan will be king.
translation.es: No asuma que Aethelstan será rey.

translation.en: -Who is supporting Aelfweard? -[Aldhelm] The ealdormen of Wessex.
translation.es: - ¿Quién apoya a Aelfweard?- Los ealdormen de Wessex.

translation.en: Of course. Still claiming Aethelstan's a bastard?
Yes. Aelfweard has the wealth of Wiltunscir behind him.
translation.es: Sí. Aelfweard posee la riquezade Wiltunscir.

translation.en: Our spies in Aegelesburg say he's there, openly recruiting mercenaries.
translation.es: Según espías en Aegelesburg,está reclutando mercenarios.

translation.en: We will go to Aegelesburg and seize him before he is at full force.
translation.es: Lo capturaremos en Aegelesburgantes de que cobre fuerza.

translation.en: We would prefer your guard.
My offer gives Aethelstan the time to go to Winchester to be crowned,
translation.es: Mi oferta le da tiempo a Aethelstande coronarse en Winchester

translation.en: and we avoid a clash of armies.
I swore an oath to protect Aethelstan--
And of course, you are a man of your word.
translation.es: Claro, su palabra es de fiar.

translation.en: Yet your oath to swear your lands to the king remains unfulfilled.
translation.es: Pero no ha cumplidoel juramento de sus tierras al rey.

translation.en: Your husband showed himself hostile to those of Danish blood.
translation.es: Su esposo fue hostilcon los de sangre danesa.

translation.en: As such, he was not the right man to unite England.
translation.es: No era el hombre indicadopara unir a Inglaterra

translation.en: If he had been, England would be united.
translation.es: o Inglaterra sería una. Pero las cosas pueden ser diferentes.

translation.en: [Aldhelm] But now things can be different.
translation.es: Pero las cosas pueden ser diferentes.

translation.en: Aethelstan can be the king to fulfill the Saxon dream.
translation.es: Aethelstan podría cumplir el sueño sajón.

translation.en: If he chooses to swear--
I swore an oath of loyalty, and it stands.
translation.es: Hice un juramento de lealtady lo mantendré.

translation.en: If Aelfweard is buying mercenaries, he will be looking for men from all parts.
translation.es: Si Aelfweard contrata mercenarios,buscará hombres en todas partes.

translation.en: Do you think we can still execute an ambush?
If it is for Aethelstan, then yes.
-If he does not fall asleep. -Once. I fell asleep once.
translation.es: - Si no se queda dormido.- Solo fue una vez.

translation.en: Are you certain this is better than a band of young fighters?
translation.es: ¿Seguro que esto es mejorque una horda de guerreros?

translation.en: I hear you do little these days but feast and hunt.
translation.es: Escuché que ya no hacemás que comer y cazar.

translation.en: I will not send young men to do a task I swore to do myself.
translation.es: No enviaré a jóvenesa una tarea que yo juré hacer.

translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -[Finan] Come on, you little…
Come on! Come on.
Osbert! What news from our borders? Do the Scots behave themselves?
translation.es: ¡Osbert! ¿Y las fronteras?¿Los escoceses se portan bien?

translation.en: Yes, Father. There are rumors Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.es: Sí, padre. Los Guerreros Lobosatracaron en Derwent.

translation.en: -Wolf-Warriors? -Why are you carrying your sword?
We're riding to protect Aethelstan from his brother.
translation.es: Cuidaremos a Aethelstan de su hermano.

translation.en: Then I will come.
translation.es: Iré. Cualquier pelea tuya es mía también.

translation.en: -Any fight of yours is mine. -Stay here and protect your birthright.
translation.es: Iré. Cualquier pelea tuya es mía también. - Cuida tu derecho de nacimiento.- No me sentaré a esperarlo.

translation.en: No good comes of sitting waiting for a birthright.
translation.es: - Cuida tu derecho de nacimiento.- No me sentaré a esperarlo.

translation.en: So you train the horses and you teach that boy how to defend himself.
translation.es: Entrena los caballosy enséñale a ese chico a defenderse.

translation.en: No one likes the third son of a dead king.
translation.es: Nadie quiere al tercer hijode un rey muerto.

translation.en: Father.
-Will you swear our lands to Aethelstan? -I must honor my word.
translation.es: - ¿Jurarás nuestras tierras a Aethelstan?- Debo honrar mi palabra.

translation.en: Northumbrians will be sad to lose their pagan lord.
translation.es: Northumbria lamentaráperder a su señor pagano.

translation.en: [Finan] Gotcha!
-Look at this little bastard. -Are we ready?
translation.es: Mira esta mierda. - ¿Listos?- Se queja de su silla.

translation.en: [Sihtric] He's complaining about his saddle.
-Says his arse gets sore. -[Finan] Didn't say arse. I said my back.
translation.es: - Le duele el culo.- Dije que la espalda.

translation.en: [Ingrith] I made you this.
And one for each of you.
Men who sit on cold earth find the cold earth calls for them.
translation.es: Quien se sienta en la tierra fríatermina enterrado en ella.

translation.en: Once again, she shows herself a seer.
translation.es: Otra vez, demuestra que es vidente.

translation.en: Lord, it was nothing.
Tell it again.
"Seven kings must die," Lord.
-"Seven kings--" -Ingrith, no.
Go on.
"And the woman you love."
I'm no king, and I have no woman.
translation.es: No soy rey y no tengo mujer.

translation.en: -It means nothing. -[Aldhelm] Lord Uhtred.
I told my son to train yours.
translation.es: Pedí a mi hijo que entrene al suyo.

translation.en: While you are here, take Wassa as your serving woman.
translation.es: Mientras esté aquí,Wassa será su sirvienta.

translation.en: -Make this fortress your home. -I wish to say one thing of Aethelstan.
translation.es: - Siéntase en casa en la fortaleza.- Algo sobre Aethelstan.

translation.en: He is not quite the carefree boy you raised.
translation.es: No es el chico despreocupado que crio.

translation.en: He has grown very much into his faith.
translation.es: Su fe se ha hecho más grande.

translation.en: The Brotherhood of Oswald exert great influence.
translation.es: La Hermandad de Oswaldejerce una gran influencia.

translation.en: I have scared off such men before. For some reason, monks find me terrifying.
translation.es: He asustado a hombres así. Por alguna razón, los monjes me temen.

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Let's go play kingmaker. -[Finan] Once again.
translation.es: Juguemos a hacer reyes. Otra vez.

translation.en: [Aethelstan] My father? No, that cannot be.
I thought God had given him the winter.
translation.es: Creí que Dios le había dado el invierno.

translation.en: [Pyrlig] Lord Aethelstan, you should make haste to Wessex for coronation.
translation.es: Lord Aethelstan,debe ir a Wessex para la coronación.

translation.en: Your brother gathers men.
Establish yourself at Winchester before he raises an army.
translation.es: Vaya a Winchesterantes de que tenga un ejército.

translation.en: We will leave when God commands us to leave, Father Pyrlig.
translation.es: Iremos cuando Diosnos lo ordene, padre Pyrlig.

translation.en: And that command has not been given.
translation.es: Y no hemos recibido esa orden.

translation.en: Return when you have prayed.
[Aethelstan] Do I depart?
[Ingilmundr] Only the book has answers.
Play.
You have been guided to the Book of Matthew, verse 157.
translation.es: Lo guiaron al Evangelio de Mateo,versículo 157.

translation.en: "Then Jesus went thence and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon."
translation.es: "Jesús se fue de allía las costas de Tiro y Sidón".

translation.en: God wants you to fight.
Oh. Thank you, lady.
[sentry] Halt. State your business here.
We heard a man is looking for fighters.
We come to make some coin.
Go on.
-This place has fallen to shit. -[Uhtred] Edward left it to decline.
translation.es: - El lugar está abandonado.- Eduardo lo dejó morir.

translation.en: I'm glad Aethelflaed is not here to see it.
translation.es: Me alegra que Aethelflaed no pueda verlo.

translation.en: Word has spread. [Sihtric] I swear I've fought half these men.
translation.es: - Se enteraron.- He luchado contra la mitad.

translation.en: [Finan] This is not someone trying to recruit. This is preparing for a battle.
translation.es: - No están tratando de reclutar.- Se preparan para la batalla.

translation.en: [Uhtred] That is the youth Aelfweard.
Go see what men know of his plans.
-Is that amber in your sword? -How much do you want for it?
-[Uhtred] Go home to your mothers. -[teen 2] Edgar! No.
Wilfrid!
Wilfrid!
Do you speak to me, friend?
Your pardon. I thought you were Wilfrid.
A great man I fought with at Tettenhall.
Wait, you were at Tettenhall?
My father was there.
-Who do you fight for now? -Aelf… something?
-Saxon names are much alike. -The Aelf who marches on Wessex?
translation.es: - Los nombres sajones se parecen.- ¿El que marcha en Wessex?

translation.en: You haven't heard.
No one's marching on Wessex.
I'm told the new plan is to lure Aethelstan here.
translation.es: Dijeron que el planera atraer a Aethelstan.

translation.en: Aethelstan is on his way.
Aelfweard challenged him to battle, and he's accepted.
translation.es: Aelfweard lo retó a una batalla y aceptó.

translation.en: Why would he agree to that?
Because he's young, and they've baited him.
translation.es: Es joven y mordió el anzuelo.

translation.en: They plan to snare him between the gate and men hidden in the hills.
translation.es: Lo emboscaránentre la puerta y las colinas.

translation.en: Then we take control before he arrives.
translation.es: Tomaremos el control antes de que llegue.

translation.en: We can't seize this town with just us, Lord.
We do not need to seize the town.
[Finan] Hey! Can I tempt you to play for money, friend?
[Uhtred] Tie them up and secure the bolt. Stay low until Aethelstan arrives.
translation.es: Átenlos y aseguren el cerrojo.Ocúltense hasta que llegue Aethelstan.

translation.en: [Finan] If there's a bed, it's mine.
translation.es: Si hay una cama, es mía.

translation.en: [Uhtred] He's here.
[guard in distance] Raise the alarm! Soldiers approach the southern gate!
translation.es: ¡Den la alarma!¡Los soldados se acercan a la puerta sur!

translation.en: [Aelfweard] Come no further! Aegelesburg is loyal to me now.
translation.es: ¡No vayan más lejos!Aegelesburg me es leal ahora.

translation.en: We do not negotiate with bastards.
Nor do we surrender.
-You'll have to starve us out. -I am not foolish, brother.
translation.es: - Tendrán que matarnos de hambre.- No soy tonto, hermano.

translation.en: I assumed you would place a trap.
Perhaps delay me here until your forces could attack at rearguard.
translation.es: Demorarme para atacar por la retaguardia.

translation.en: Show him what's left of his men!
translation.es: ¡Muéstrale lo que queda de sus hombres!

translation.en: [Aethelstan] You can yield now, or we destroy the gate and kill all your men.
translation.es: Cede ahora o destruiremos la puertay mataremos a tus hombres.

translation.en: The gates will hold. No yield will come.
[Aethelstan] Then you will be destroyed.
Get ready to open the door.
[Aelfweard] I am the rightful king. Your mother was a whore.
translation.es: Soy el rey legítimo.Tu madre era una puta.

translation.en: All good men know it. You have no allies.
translation.es: Los hombres buenos lo saben.No tienes aliados.

translation.en: -I'm Uhtred of Bebbanburg. -Uhtred.
[Uhtred] You know me as a man who speaks the truth,
translation.es: Me conoces como un hombre honesto,

translation.en: so hear me when I say, for the common good, stand down.
translation.es: así que escúchame cuando te pidoque te retires por el bien común.

translation.en: My men control the gate. You're outnumbered on all sides.
translation.es: Mis hombres controlan la puerta.Te superan en número.

translation.en: Yield.
Let this end with peace.
[Aethelstan] Give yourself to me, brother.
Then it is over.
Forgive me for my failings, and give comfort to my mother's kin.
translation.es: Perdón por mis fallas.Consuelen a los parientes de mi madre.

translation.en: Tell them of my exile
and how we sought to honor our discarded bloodline.
translation.es: y cómo buscamos honrarnuestro linaje menospreciado.

translation.en: -For Wessex! -[men] For Wessex!
open the gate.
-No! -[Aethelstan] God chose me rightful heir.
[Uhtred] Aethelstan!
Advance!
Leave no enemy alive!
[Finan] Lord, stop this madness!
[Uhtred] Stop!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan!
[Sihtric] Get back! Hide!
-[mercenary] I submit! Please don't-- -[grunts]
Aethelstan!
[mercenary] Please, show mercy!
[Uhtred] No!
Stop! They're surrendering!
Aethelstan!
-Aethelsta-- -[high-pitched ringing]
[man] Lord! Lord, help us!
Aethelstan!
Aethelstan!
-Stand down your men. -[Aethelstan] Uhtred, why are you here?
[Uhtred] To stop this. Your enemy has surrendered. Halt your men.
translation.es: Para detener esto.El enemigo se rindió. Detén a tus hombres.

translation.en: -Let him approach and call a halt. -[guard] Yes, my lord.
-What happened to you? -What happened to you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué te pasó?- ¿Qué te pasó a ti?

translation.en: -You had no need to kill your brother. -I did, or in time, he would return.
translation.es: - No tenías que matar a tu hermano.- Sí. - Iba a volver.- Faltaste a tu palabra.

translation.en: -You dishonored your word. -I did not.
translation.es: - Iba a volver.- Faltaste a tu palabra.

translation.en: I told him to yield. I did not say he would survive.
translation.es: Dije que se rindiera. No que sobreviviría.

translation.en: It was never our plan to let him live. Lord, reverse the order.
translation.es: Nunca planeamos dejarlo vivir.Señor, revierta la orden.

translation.en: We are close to routing them.
-Hired men have no quarrel with you. -You were right not to seek his help.
translation.es: - No te hicieron nada.- Hizo bien en no pedirle ayuda.

translation.en: You kill 100 fathers, you give 300 sons a reason to defy you.
translation.es: Si matas a cien padres,le das a 300 hijos razón para desafiarte.

translation.en: Think!
Now's the time to unify.
Uhtred may be right in this matter.
I speak only as a man who has made mistakes before.
translation.es: Hablo como un hombreque ha cometido errores.

translation.en: -I'm Uhtred of-- -I know who you are.
translation.es: - Soy Uhtred de…- Sé quién es.

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Uhtred, this is Lord Ingilmundr.
A great commander and a great friend to me.
Then a friend to me.
Why the Danish name?
Born to a Dane, but raised a Saxon.
I found Christ through the works of Alfred,
and indeed through the writings of your son in Rome.
translation.es: y los escritos de su hijo en Roma.

translation.en: You must be proud of him.
He is a true scholar.
I'm just the fool who made him.
translation.es: Solo soy el tonto que lo hizo.

translation.en: Ingilmundr holds the garrison at Thelwael on the Wirral.
translation.es: Ingilmundr tiene guarniciónen Thelwael, en Wirral.

translation.en: He knows many of the people we knew from Rumcofa. Good people. I should like to see them again.
translation.es: - Conoce a muchos de Rumcofa.- Son buenos. Quisiera volver a verlos.

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Yes. Perhaps after you've sworn Northumbria to the new king.
translation.es: Sí, después de haber juradoNorthumbria al nuevo rey.

translation.en: Honor your word.
Swear to Aethelstan what you denied his father.
translation.es: Jure a Aethelstanlo que le negó a su padre.

translation.en: Cede your lands and make England whole.
translation.es: Ceda sus tierras y unifique Inglaterra.

translation.en: As you say, it is the time for unity.
translation.es: Como dice, es hora de la unidad.

translation.en: I will swear to a king, and you are not yet crowned.
translation.es: Juraré ante un rey y aún no te coronas.

translation.en: Nor will I kneel to you covered in blood.
translation.es: No me arrodillaré cubierto de sangre.

translation.en: I will renounce my lands in the Great Hall at Winchester.
translation.es: Renunciaré a mis tierrasen el Salón de Winchester.

translation.en: -It doesn't need to be done with ceremony. -But Uhtred is a man of his word.
translation.es: - La ceremonia sobra.- Pero Uhtred es un hombre de palabra.

translation.en: Come to Winchester.
Heal the wound.
[Ingilmundr] How did he know we were coming here? [Aethelstan] He's always found a way to protect me.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo supo que veníamos?- Siempre ha querido protegerme.

translation.en: Perhaps he has friends who keep one eye on you.
translation.es: Quizá tenga amigos que lo vigilan.

translation.en: [chuckles] My mother was the same.
It's touching, how you still defer to him.
translation.es: Me conmueve que usted aún lo respete.

translation.en: -He's been steadfast a long time. -And noble that you trust him.
translation.es: - Ha demostrado su lealtad.- Qué noble por confiar en él.

translation.en: Given all that went on with your father.
translation.es: Dado lo que pasó con su padre.

translation.en: [Constantin] Which boy prevailed?
[Domnal] Aethelstan.
Killed his brother in cold blood and will now claim the Saxon crown.
translation.es: Mató a su hermano a sangre fría y ahora, reclamará la corona sajona.

translation.en: [Constantin] Then it's settled. Any word on renewal of the treaty?
translation.es: Está decidido.¿Alguna novedad sobre el tratado?

translation.en: Push Winchester.
-Make contact. -Lord, we've had word of something else.
translation.es: - Haz contacto.- Señor, nos enteramos de algo más.

translation.en: -The Dane, Anlaf, seeks a meeting. -The one who eats the flesh of men?
translation.es: - El danés, Anlaf, quiere verlo.- ¿El que come carne humana?

translation.en: An assembly with you, and the kings of Man, Shetland, and Orkney.
translation.es: Quiere una asamblea con ustedy los reyes de Man, Shetland y Orkney.

translation.en: I will not be the lone Christian lured to meet Dane kings.
translation.es: No seré el único cristianoque se reúna con los reyes daneses.

translation.en: They might offer something of interest.
Seek to renew a peace with Saxons.
translation.es: Busquen la paz con los sajones.

translation.en: Edward kept the truce. We have no reason to think his son will not.
translation.es: Eduardo mantuvo la tregua.Su hijo hará lo mismo.

translation.en: [Domnal] I'll send word.
[Anlaf] His own flesh, put to the knife.
-He is more brutal than you suggested. -His heart has hardened.
translation.es: - Es más brutal de lo que dijo.- Se endureció.

translation.en: Which should harden those against him.
-Do other kings in Britain hear our call? -They pretend to be deaf to us.
translation.es: - ¿Otros reyes escuchan nuestro llamado?- Fingen no saber nada.

translation.en: -But I know they listen. -They should.
Aethelstan will become greedy.
You would know ambition, Father.
Eh, and when my lands are yours, you will know it too.
translation.es: Cuando mis tierras sean tuyas,también la conocerás.

translation.en: Return to Winchester.
Watch everyone.
And bring me word when there's word to tell.
-[Uhtred grunts] -[Osbert] Father, have you been injured?
-Nothing that will not heal. -[Eadgifu] Tell me the news is wrong.
translation.es: - ¿Se lastimó?- Es solo un rasguño. Dígame que es mentira.¿Aethelstan mató a su hermano?

translation.en: -Did Aethelstan turn on his own blood? -[Uhtred] Yes.
translation.es: Dígame que es mentira.¿Aethelstan mató a su hermano?

translation.en: -Aelfweard did not survive. -Then Edmund cannot return to Winchester.
translation.es: Sí. Aelfweard no sobrevivió. Edmund no puede regresar a Winchester.

translation.en: He will always be seen as a rival.
Aethelstan has always shown great affection for your son.
[Uhtred] But she is right.
He has fallen under an influence.
I shall not leave Bebbanburg until the threat passes.
translation.es: No me iré hasta que pase la amenaza.

translation.en: -You're welcome here as long as you wish. -[Aldhelm] And it will pass.
translation.es: - Es bienvenida cuanto quiera.- Ya pasará.

translation.en: The duties of kingship will focus Aethelstan's mind.
But I should return south.
I will assess the mood.
[Pyrlig] Almighty and everlasting God,
pour out the spirit of thy grace and blessing upon this, thy servant,
translation.es: derrama el espíritu de tu graciay bendición sobre tu sirviente,

translation.en: King Aethelstan.
That, as by the imposition of our hands, he is this day crowned king.
translation.es: A quien, por imposiciónde nuestras manos, coronamos rey.

translation.en: So he may, by thy sanctification,
translation.es: Para que él, por tu santificación,

translation.en: continue always thy chosen servant, through Christ, our Lord.
Grant him the faith of Abraham,
the wisdom of Solomon, the courage of David.
translation.es: la sabiduría de Salomón,el valor de David.

translation.en: Vivat Rex! Vivat Rex!
translation.es: II: REY DE WESSEX,MERCIA Y ANGLIA ORIENTAL

translation.en: [Aethelstan] You were not there. This moment was all we had talked of.
translation.es: No estabas. No hemos hablado de otra cosa.

translation.en: -And you were not there. -No.
I was here.
The call of the scripture always comes first.
translation.es: El llamado de las escrituras es primero.

translation.en: You believe that, don't you?
Yes, yes, of course.
Then you will be a great king of England.
translation.es: Será un gran rey de Inglaterra

translation.en: And all will speak of you as they did Alfred.
translation.es: y todos lo recordarán como a Alfred.

translation.en: Does Uhtred stand by his word?
No. Uhtred has not come.
-Clearly, he-- -He wishes to remain king in his own land.
translation.es: - Claramente…- Quiere seguir siendo rey en su tierra.

translation.en: May God protect him from his vanity.
translation.es: Que Dios lo proteja de su vanidad.

translation.en: But towards you, it is a cruelty.
translation.es: Pero es una crueldad para usted.

translation.en: And I am sorry. Here. Come. Come.
What torture to enact on so kind a soul.
translation.es: Qué forma de torturara un alma tan gentil.

translation.en: -I thought you had both abandoned me. -Of course I would not.
translation.es: - Pensé que me habías abandonado.- Claro que no.

translation.en: I'm just surprised Uhtred could be so foolish.
translation.es: Me sorprende que Uhtred sea tan tonto.

translation.en: You would've thought his years would make him wiser.
translation.es: Creí que, con los años, sería más astuto.

translation.en: Perhaps he still sees the boy you once were,
translation.es: Quizá aún vea al chico que fue…

translation.en: and not the man you have become.
translation.es: y no al hombre en el que se convirtió.

translation.en: [Finan] Lord.
It's not Serpent's Breath, but…
translation.es: No es Aliento de Serpiente, pero…

translation.en: it's lighter, it's sharper, and it's got a garnet.
translation.es: Es más ligera, afilada y… tiene un granate.

translation.en: Give it a name.
Manslayer.
Ball-taker.
Uhtred, Sword of Uhtred.
You actually smiled, Lord.
Perhaps losing my sword was a sign that my battle days are over.
translation.es: Perder mi espada fue la señalde que ya no puedo luchar.

translation.en: A bad time to provoke the king.
translation.es: Mal momento para provocar al rey.

translation.en: [Uhtred] I did not provoke him.
I'm simply giving him time to prove he's not a tyrant.
translation.es: Le doy tiempopara probar que no es un tirano.

translation.en: -Otherwise… -Otherwise what?
"Seven kings must die." For what?
-What did your wife see? -She sees nothing.
I swear.
[Eadgifu] What do they celebrate?
[Uhtred] The breaking of the horses.
[Eadgifu] Thank Osbert for the care he has shown Edmund.
translation.es: Agradezca a Osbert los cuidados a Edmund.

translation.en: [Uhtred] He's part of Bebbanburg now.
You both are.
[Eadgifu] Yes, my son is quite changed.
translation.es: Sí, mi hijo está muy cambiado.

translation.en: There was a somberness at the palace that has lifted.
translation.es: En el palacio se veía triste y ya no.

translation.en: It's the air here.
Brings out good spirits in everyone.
translation.es: Hace que todos se pongan de buen ánimo.

translation.en: [Uhtred] You yourself seem happier.
translation.es: Usted también se ve más feliz.

translation.en: I am, Lord Uhtred.
Some grief has passed, and I feel…
translation.es: El dolor pasó un poco y me siento…

translation.en: more ready for the world.
[Osbert] Control! Good!
Forgive us these sins that we commit.
translation.es: Señor, ten piedad de nuestras almasy perdona nuestros pecados.

translation.en: Will we be forgiven?
Our sin weighs heavy.
Yes, it does.
But remember,
God holds us in the balance.
translation.es: Dios nos pone en la balanza.

translation.en: Every sin can be weighed against an act of faith.
translation.es: Cada pecado se compensa con un acto de fe.

translation.en: Grow the faith and the sin is diminished.
translation.es: Aumente su fe y el pecado disminuirá.

translation.en: What if the shadow of sin obscures the faith?
translation.es: ¿Y si la sombra del pecado oscurece la fe?

translation.en: Come.
Perhaps return to your grandfather's vision for England.
translation.es: Puede retomar la visiónde su abuelo para Inglaterra.

translation.en: Perhaps now there is an urgency to bring the pagans to light.
translation.es: Quizá sea urgentellevar a los paganos a la luz.

translation.en: Will that cleanse me? Us?
Well, surely the greater the lands, the greater the faith.
translation.es: Cuanto más grandes las tierras,mayor será la fe.

translation.en: Go beyond what Alfred dreamed of.
translation.es: Rebase todos los sueños de Alfred.

translation.en: Look to the islands God made, not the countries ordained by men,
translation.es: Mire las islas de Dios,no los países de los hombres,

translation.en: and bring all to Christianity.
So when you are judged,
you will be found in balance.
And thus may accept both the sin…
translation.es: Y así, aceptará tanto el pecado…

translation.en: and the conquest against it.
[Finan] Lord!
Stop.
[Eadgifu] What do you talk of?
Oh my faith, Lady. I cannot lie.
The ladies here care for Lord Uhtred and wish keenly he would find a woman.
translation.es: Todas cuidamos a lord Uhtredy queremos que encuentre una mujer.

translation.en: Well, they shall be sore of heart. The widow of a king will not marry a lord.
translation.es: Las decepcionaré. La viuda de un reyno se casará con un señor.

translation.en: I shall have to be more careful in how I conduct myself.
translation.es: Tendré más cuidado con mi conducta.

translation.en: It is not the gossips you should fear, Lady.
translation.es: No debe temerle a los chismes, milady.

translation.en: This peace may not sustain.
Lord Uhtred has snubbed the king.
The women Uhtred has affection for become a target for his enemies.
translation.es: Las mujeres cercanas a Uhtredson blanco de sus enemigos.

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Sihtric! -Sh-sh.
[Uhtred] What have you learnt?
Aethelstan has claimed Eoferwic.
He says since Rognvaldr is dead, there is no king, so it belongs to him.
translation.es: Como Rognvaldr está muertoy no hay rey, dice que le pertenece.

translation.en: Eoferwic?
They see me as their lord now. Aethelstan knows this.
translation.es: Ahora me ven como su señor.Aethelstan lo sabe.

translation.en: He is demanding all come with tribute.
Not just Saxon chiefs, but all kings of Britain.
translation.es: No solo de los sajones,sino de los reyes británicos.

translation.en: All the mainland and all the outlying islands.
translation.es: Todo el continente y las islas adyacentes.

translation.en: Lord?
Declare yourself king here. Like your forebears.
translation.es: Declárese rey aquí. Como sus antepasados.

translation.en: No. This is Aethelstan.
If he chooses the wrong path, I must tell him.
translation.es: Si se equivoca, se lo diré.

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord.
"There went out a decree that all the world should be taxed."
You owe no tribute! Return to your villages.
translation.es: ¡No deben tributo! Regresen a sus aldeas.

translation.en: -Uhtred! Calm yourself. -Pyrlig? What is this tribute?
He says it is to build churches, but, please, there are spies everywhere.
translation.es: Es para construir iglesias,pero hay espías por todos lados.

translation.en: Tell your arseling apprentice he's badly misjudged the mood of Scotland.
translation.es: Dile a tu aprendiz que juzgó malel estado de ánimo de Escocia.

translation.en: You seem upset.
We came to renew our treaty.
Instead, we've been left waiting for days, only to be told we are supplicants.
translation.es: En cambio, nos dejaron esperando por días.Solo para decir que somos suplicantes.

translation.en: I would be careful.
We've had other offers of alliance.
-Why is Aethelstan doing this? -He says to unite Christians.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué hace esto?- Pide unir a los cristianos.

translation.en: And in his prayers, he talks much of atonement.
translation.es: En sus oraciones, habla de expiación.

translation.en: Atonement? For what?
The death of his brother, the bastardy of his parentage?
translation.es: ¿La muerte de su hermano,el bastardo de su ascendencia?

translation.en: I do not know.
Lord Aldhelm and I try daily to dissuade,
translation.es: Lord Aldhelm y yo intentamos disuadirlo,

translation.en: but there is talk of conquest and forced baptism.
translation.es: pero dicen que conquistaráy obligará al bautizo.

translation.en: -Where is he? -The Devil's Stones.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está?- En las piedras del diablo.

translation.en: He thinks he fights the devil.
translation.es: Cree que lucha contra el diablo.

translation.en: [Uhtred] This is madness. Aldhelm.
These stones have stood for generations.
They are an insult to God, apparently.
translation.es: Aparentemente, son un insulto a Dios.

translation.en: Is that Owain, King of Strathclyde?
[Aldhelm] Aethelstan wanted him to witness it. They were built by his forebears.
translation.es: Aethelstan quería un testigo.Lo hicieron sus antepasados.

translation.en: He is seeking to humiliate powerful men?
[Uhtred] King Hywel.
translation.es: Rey Hywel. IV: REY DE WEALAS

translation.en: He dares ask submission from Wealas?
translation.es: ¿Se atreve a pedirle sumisión a Wealas?

translation.en: After all you did for Mercia? What choice do I have, Uhtred?
translation.es: - ¿Y lo que hizo por Mercia?- ¿Qué opción tengo, Uhtred?

translation.en: He took my son to Winchester.
translation.es: - Se llevó a mi hijo a Winchester.- ¿Como rehén?

translation.en: -He is keeping your son hostage? -You take the son, you take a future king.
translation.es: - Se llevó a mi hijo a Winchester.- ¿Como rehén? Tomas al hijo y tomas a un futuro rey.

translation.en: -Now I am forced to follow his bidding. -I will tell him this cannot stand.
translation.es: - Ahora tengo que seguir sus órdenes.- Le diré que no puede hacer esto.

translation.en: King Hywel, I swear, Wealas's faithfulness will not be spat on.
translation.es: Rey Hywel, juro que no escupiráen la lealtad de Wealas.

translation.en: Our poets spoke this.
That a Saxon would break us all to build their country.
translation.es: Que un sajón nos destruiría a todospara construir su país.

translation.en: This is not just a Saxon country.
translation.es: Este país no es solo sajón.

translation.en: Aldhelm, get me close to him. I will stop this.
translation.es: Aldhelm, llévame con él. Detendré esto.

translation.en: [guard] Halt. Stay back.
[Aldhelm] Step aside! The king requested Uhtred speak with him.
translation.es: ¡A un lado! El rey pidió a Uhtred.

translation.en: King Aethelstan!
[Uhtred] Lord King,
let me speak with you alone.
[Uhtred] You should not have stepped on my land.
translation.es: - No debiste pisar mis tierras.- Rompiste tu palabra.

translation.en: You should not have broken your word, humiliated me,
translation.es: - No debiste pisar mis tierras.- Rompiste tu palabra. Me humillaste como a mi padre.

translation.en: as you humiliated my father.
translation.es: Me humillaste como a mi padre.

translation.en: I'm trying to make you see you're on the wrong path.
-You do the bidding of Ingilmundr-- -I do the bidding of the Lord.
translation.es: - Obedeces a Ingilmundr…- Obedezco al Señor.

translation.en: Do you really seek to convert Danes?
-Did I teach you nothing of respect? -Many Danes welcome the Lord.
translation.es: - ¿No te enseñé a respetar?- Muchos lo desean.

translation.en: -Those in my court thank me for it. -Many do not wish it, and you know this.
translation.es: - Mi corte me lo agradece.- Muchos no y lo sabes.

translation.en: Aethelstan, you've always known it.
-Even Alfred respected this. -I have more to atone for than Alfred.
translation.es: - Hasta Alfred respetaba eso.- Tengo más que expiar que Alfred.

translation.en: Who tells you this? Ingilmundr?
Does he tell you you are damned without his guidance?
translation.es: ¿Te dice que estás condenado sin su guía?

translation.en: For I've seen before men under the spell of those who claim to know the gods.
translation.es: He visto el hechizode quienes dicen conocer a los dioses.

translation.en: He has been a great friend to me.
translation.es: Ha sido un gran amigo para mí.

translation.en: Aethelstan, hump who you wish,
but do not fall under the influence of those who seek power--
translation.es: pero no te dejes manipularpor gente ambiciosa.

translation.en: Who makes such vicious claim against me?
-No one. -Who tells such lies?
-It has not been talked of. -Lord Aldhelm, does he spy for…
translation.es: - Nadie habla de eso.- ¿Lord Aldhelm me espía?

translation.en: What has been said, by who, and for how long?
translation.es: ¿Quién ha dicho qué y desde cuándo?

translation.en: No one has said anything. I care not for that, but for you.
translation.es: Nadie ha dicho nada.No me importa eso, sino tú.

translation.en: Aethelstan, you are a kind man, but you are tenderhearted,
translation.es: Aethelstan, eres un buen hombre,pero eres sensible.

translation.en: and Ingilmundr is seeking power for himself and for his brotherhood.
translation.es: Ingilmundr busca poderpara él y su hermandad.

translation.en: Lies. Lies and ignominy.
There's no ignominy. He just turns you from your kin.
translation.es: No es ninguna. Te aleja de tu familia.

translation.en: And you are turned from your king! You seek to be one yourself.
translation.es: ¡Y tú te alejaste de tu rey!Sueñas con llegar a ser rey.

translation.en: Lord, they consecrate the ground
and would request you to give the blessing.
translation.es: y quieren que dé la bendición.

translation.en: Yes, of course.
Let us leave the King of Northumbria to think on his errors.
translation.es: Dejaremos pensar al rey de Northumbria.

translation.en: I have no dream to be a king.
Only to protect you.
Like you ran to protect him in Aegelesburg and ended up being beaten by boys?
translation.es: ¿Como en Aegelesburg,esa vez que terminaron golpeándolo?

translation.en: Should he really take counsel from a man who loses his sword to a child?
translation.es: ¿Debe escuchar a un hombreque pierde su espada ante un niño?

translation.en: Northumbria needs a lord with lust for battle.
There are rumors Anlaf has arrived and will come Viking.
translation.es: Dicen que Anlaf llegó y vendrá a saquear.

translation.en: Do not think he will spare you just because you follow the same gods.
translation.es: No te perdonará solo porque siguena los mismos dioses.

translation.en: Keep him here a night and make him swear at dawn.
translation.es: Que se quede y jure al amanecer.

translation.en: In time, you will come begging for his help.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, vendrá a rogar su ayuda.

translation.en: As all fathers fall,
and all sons take their place.
translation.es: y todos los hijos toman su lugar.

translation.en: Lord Ingilmundr has declared you an enemy of God
translation.es: Lord Ingilmundr lo ha declaradoenemigo de Dios

translation.en: to incite his followers to kill you.
translation.es: para incitar a que lo maten.

translation.en: Aethelstan would not allow it.
Which is why Ingilmundr seeks to keep his hands clean of it
translation.es: Por eso, Ingilmundrno quiere ensuciarse las manos

translation.en: and has left the camp.
To go where?
[Aldhelm] This way.
Go up and around. There's no guard.
translation.es: Suba y gire. No hay guardia.

translation.en: Him. That is the man.
What did you speak of with the pagan?
[sentry] Horsemen approach!
[Osbert] Stay back from my gates and tell me who you are.
translation.es: Aléjate de mis puertas y dime quién eres.

translation.en: Lord Ingilmundr, and I come at Lord Uhtred's request.
translation.es: Lord Ingilmundr,y vengo a petición de lord Uhtred.

translation.en: He's delayed in Eoferwic as he renews his vow to the king.
translation.es: Se retrasó en Eoferwicmientras renueva su voto al rey.

translation.en: He asked I help protect you.
Protect from what?
There is a rumor of Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.es: Dicen que los Guerreros Lobosllegaron a Derwent.

translation.en: [guard] Open the gate! Open the gate!
Do not give the order.
Think on all we have shared.
translation.es: Piensa en todo lo que hemos compartido.

translation.en: You're lost from yourself, Aethelstan.
We fought together--
And despite this, you drip poison against me and plot with Uhtred. -No. -Yes.
translation.es: Y a pesar de eso, mientes sobre míy conspiras con Uhtred.

translation.en: -No. -Yes!
You turned your back, Aldhelm.
Now I turn mine.
[Eadgifu] Lord Ingilmundr, you bring welcome news of Lord Uhtred's supplication.
translation.es: Lord Ingilmundr, trae buenas noticiasde la súplica de lord Uhtred.

translation.en: Will you journey south with me to let me bear witness to it?
translation.es: ¿Me acompaña al sur para que sea testigo?

translation.en: Lady, we have ridden hard to get here. At least let us rest a day or so.
translation.es: Lady, hemos cabalgado mucho.Al menos déjenos descansar un día.

translation.en: Oh, but I have been trapped in Bebbanburg a good while.
Believe me, you do not want to find yourself here longer than intended.
translation.es: Créame, no querrá quedarsemás tiempo del necesario.

translation.en: -They've been warned! -[Finan] Now!
We overtook you on the road.
Whatever power you hold over Aethelstan, today it ends.
translation.es: El poder que tienesobre Aethelstan se termina hoy.

translation.en: [Ingilmundr grunts] My sword!
You still believe in Valhalla!
Aethelstan cares for you. I will not divide us further.
translation.es: Aethelstan lo quiere. No nos dividiré más.

translation.en: Put him below.
Christians amongst you, defend me! Who is your Lord?
Lord Uhtred or the Lord Jesus Christ?
The people of Bebbanburg will not be divided by faith.
translation.es: La fe no dividirá a Bebbanburg.

translation.en: Rise up, you fools!
Tell the king the terms of his release.
translation.es: Dale al rey los términos de liberación.

translation.en: He makes peace with Northumbria and guarantees the border.
translation.es: Paz con Northumbriay garantizar la frontera.

translation.en: -No one is forced to follow his god. -Yes, Lord.
translation.es: - Nadie debe seguir a su dios.- Sí, milord.

translation.en: Quite a price.
-Will Aethelstan agree? -[Uhtred] Let us hope so.
He seems to discard his friends rather quickly now.
translation.es: Últimamente, no ha respetado sus alianzas.

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Truly, you bless an unworthy soul.
-May God reward your kindness. -Amen.
translation.es: - Que Dios recompense su bondad.- Amén.

translation.en: [Anlaf] Aethelstan turns against his friends.
Succumbs to a wild dream to be a monarch for all your land.
translation.es: Sucumbe al sueño delirantede ser el monarca de toda la tierra.

translation.en: In time, he will come for you, Shetland.
You, Orkney.
He will take what belonged to your forebears and call it Britain.
translation.es: Tomará la tierra de sus antepasadosy la llamará Gran Bretaña.

translation.en: [Shetland] No.
He barely sets his foot upon the water. Saxon country folk.
translation.es: Casi no pone pie en el agua.Es un sajón de campo.

translation.en: We can repel them.
I'm not talking of repelling, but of meeting conquest with conquest.
translation.es: No hablo de defensa,sino de enfrentar conquista con conquista.

translation.en: [Domnal] Scotland rejects your offer.
We cannot join with pagans to attack a man who's not threatened us.
translation.es: No nos uniremos con paganospara atacar a quien no nos hizo nada.

translation.en: Christians do not choose war.
translation.es: Los cristianos no eligen la guerra.

translation.en: War is coming.
You only have to choose a side.
[Ingilmundr] God be with you.
[Wassa] The stone was rolled away, as in the scripture.
translation.es: Quitaron la piedra como en las escrituras.

translation.en: It can only be the work of an angel.
translation.es: Solo puede ser obra de un ángel.

translation.en: This way, Lord. Come and see the treasures.
translation.es: Por aquí, milord. Venga a ver los tesoros.

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord!
What word from Eoferwic?
Does he accept my terms?
I have no news.
Aethelstan is said to have returned to Winchester.
translation.es: Dicen que Aethelstan volvió a Winchester.

translation.en: Well, let us take it as a good sign.
Perhaps without his shadow, Aethelstan sees more clearly.
translation.es: Puede que Aethelstanpiense con más claridad sin su sombra.

translation.en: [Sihtric] What trouble brings you out here?
[Finan] The villagers were hunting for pagan silver.
Now they're saying it's a miracle.
translation.es: Ahora dicen que es un milagro.

translation.en: [Wassa] Make way for the King of Northumbria.
translation.es: Abran paso al rey de Northumbria.

translation.en: I told you.
They think of you as a king.
[Finan] Do you think they hope to keep half for themselves?
[Sihtric] They likely took it from Bebbanburg in the first place.
[man] You are detained in the name of King Aethelstan.
translation.es: Está detenidoen nombre del rey Aethelstan.

translation.en: [Finan] Lord.
We've been lured here.
You think?
[Wassa] Lord, I'm sorry!
I'm sorry, Lord.
The prisoner told me I had to, or I'd burn in the fires of hell.
translation.es: Me dijo que tenía que hacerloo me quemaría en el fuego del infierno.

translation.en: I will never order to open the gates.
[man] Really?
A gift from the king.
Aethelstan did this?
It's what he does to traitors.
translation.es: Se lo hace a los traidores.

translation.en: Open the gates or I slaughter your father.
translation.es: Abre las puertas o masacraré a tu padre.

translation.en: Comply and he will be spared.
Do not open.
-I can kill him in front of you. -Do not open!
translation.es: - Lo mataré frente a ti.- ¡No abras!

translation.en: -The choice is yours. -[Uhtred] Osbert! Do not open!
In your absence, Father, I command here.
translation.es: Padre, estoy a cargo en tu ausencia.

translation.en: And I command that we open.
-No! -[Sihtric] No, no, no!
[guard] Drop your sword.
Move.
Where is Aethelstan?
In time.
Bring me the Lady Eadgifu.
Come. [grunts]
[Eadgifu] I can walk.
[Eadgifu] Go on. Kill me.
[Ingilmundr] You are to be placed in the community on Lindisfarne to protect your virtue.
translation.es: La pondrán en la comunidadde Lindisfarne para proteger su virtud.

translation.en: Did you hump the heathen, Lady?
Confess.
I confess
to have prayed for your excruciating death.
translation.es: haber rezado para que tengauna muerte dolorosa.

translation.en: A no, then. You should have tried when you had the chance.
translation.es: Entonces no. Lo hubiera hecho cuando pudo.

translation.en: We're taking your son to my garrison
translation.es: Llevaremos a su hijo a Thelwael.

translation.en: at Thelwael where he will be trained for battle.
translation.es: Llevaremos a su hijo a Thelwael. - Lo van a entrenar.- No, por favor.

translation.en: No. No. Please.
translation.es: - Lo van a entrenar.- No, por favor.

translation.en: -[guard] Move! -Your son also.
[Eadgifu] No. Edmund is the blood of Alfred. He should not be fodder for a shield wall! Please!
translation.es: No, Edmund es la sangre de Alfred.No pueden usarlo en un muro de escudos.

translation.en: -[Osbert] I will take care of him. -Please!
The son of Uhtred stands for Wessex.
translation.es: El hijo de Uhtred defiende a Wessex.

translation.en: [Finan] Hey! Hey!
You, we have a plan for.
-[Uhtred] Am I to be drowned in the sea? -[Ingilmundr] I never quite know his mind.
translation.es: - ¿Me ahogaré en el mar?- Nunca sé lo que piensa.

translation.en: [Uhtred] Do not punish those in Bebbanburg.
translation.es: No castiguen a Bebbanburg.Su pelea es conmigo.

translation.en: -His fight is with me. -His fight is elsewhere.
translation.es: No castiguen a Bebbanburg.Su pelea es conmigo. Su pelea es en otro lado.

translation.en: How lucky we have found ourselves so close to the Scottish border.
translation.es: Suerte encontrarnostan cerca de la frontera escocesa.

translation.en: No, do not invade Scotland. You will lose hundreds of men.
And unleash a war for generations.
The king has no successor to fear for. It makes him strong.
translation.es: El rey no teme por su sucesor.Es una fortaleza.

translation.en: Do whatever you must to protect our sons. Do not fight him. Just capitulate.
translation.es: Protege a nuestros hijos.No pelee con él. Solo ríndase.

translation.en: Anything else is foolish.
-Aldhelm never betrayed you. -All of you betrayed me.
translation.es: - Aldhelm no te traicionó.- Todos me traicionaron.

translation.en: All those I thought as friends.
Swear now, before Bebbanburg, and I will spare your life.
translation.es: Júralo ante Bebbanburgy te perdonaré la vida.

translation.en: -No. -Then you leave me with no choice.
translation.es: - No.- Entonces, no me dejas alternativa.

translation.en: I cannot.
-Let me offer my-- -No.
Take everything from him.
I banish you from my lands to travel the earth and seas alone.
translation.es: Te destierro de mis tierraspara viajar solo.

translation.en: On pain of murder of your son.
translation.es: Bajo pena de asesinato de tu hijo.

translation.en: Let none feed or clothe him, lest become my enemy.
translation.es: Quien lo alimente o vistase volverá mi enemigo.

translation.en: Go.
Before this mercy vanishes.
[Hywel] Turn back. There is still time.
The Scots are no threat.
translation.es: Los escoceses no son una amenaza.

translation.en: This will damn you, Lord King.
[Hywel] To save us from the pagans can be a just endeavor.
translation.es: Salvarnos de los paganospuede ser un esfuerzo justo.

translation.en: But to turn on other Christians is ungodly.
translation.es: Pero volversecontra otros cristianos es impío.

translation.en: [Hywel] Your men do not want this fight. [Aethelstan] Well, perhaps I need better men.
translation.es: - Sus hombres no quieren luchar.- Tal vez necesito mejores hombres.

translation.en: Perhaps I should summon your son.
translation.es: Quizá debería llamar a su hijo.

translation.en: Lord King!
Aethelstan has attacked settlements in the lowlands.
He cannot raid us without reply.
Do I tell Anlaf you are ready to meet with him and the other kings?
translation.es: ¿Le digo a Anlaf que se reunirácon él y los otros reyes?

translation.en: Uhtred the Daneslayer.
You killed my cousin Gelf at the battle of Beamfleot.
translation.es: Mató a mi primo, Gelf,en la batalla de Beamfleot.

translation.en: Send word we have found him.
I hated Gelf.
Take him to the king.
[Uhtred] Where are you taking me?
[woman] To the very north of these islands.
translation.es: A la punta norte de estas islas.

translation.en: -[Uhtred] What do you give thanks for? -For the great battle to come.
translation.es: ¿Por qué dan gracias? Por la gran batalla que se avecina.

translation.en: Tell the jarl we're here with the King of Northumbria.
translation.es: Dile al jarl que el reyde Northumbria vino.

translation.en: -[Uhtred] All folk of Shetland? -[woman] Some of Man and Orkney join us.
translation.es: - ¿Todos son de Shetland?- Algunos de Man y Orkney se nos unieron.

translation.en: With their kings. [chuckles]
[Anlaf] Is this who they claim? The King of Northumbria?
translation.es: ¿Es el que dicen? ¿El rey de Northumbria?

translation.en: [Constantin] Aye, it's him.
-I am no king. -[Anlaf] No.
But you could be.
Sit. You are amongst friends.
[Uhtred] You join with pagans?
Aethelstan has taken an axe to the truce.
translation.es: Aethelstan se ha negado a la tregua.

translation.en: A truce you brokered.
What he has done in the villages of the lowlands--
translation.es: Lo que hizo en las tierras bajas…

translation.en: -Is it worse than his cruelty in Irland? -Tales to spread fear.
translation.es: ¿Es peor que su crueldad en Irlanda? - Son cuentos para inspirar miedo.- No podíamos más que defendernos.

translation.en: [Constantin] We had no choice but to defend ourselves.
translation.es: - Son cuentos para inspirar miedo.- No podíamos más que defendernos.

translation.en: We did not start this.
-How did you find me? Who's your spy? -We have many spies. We know many things.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo me hallaron? ¿Quién es su espía?- Tenemos muchos. Sabemos mucho.

translation.en: [Constantin] We know Aethelstan has banished you. And we know he gets humped like a woman.
translation.es: - Sabemos que Aethelstan te desterró.- Y que lo montan como a una mujer.

translation.en: That may be customary to you pagans,
translation.es: Puede ser habitual para los paganos,

translation.en: but as a Christian, it cannot be endured.
translation.es: pero los cristianos no lo pueden soportar.

translation.en: -He endures it often, from what I hear. -So…
translation.es: - Él lo soporta a menudo.- Entonces…

translation.en: As a man who shares our enemy,
translation.es: como su enemigoes el mismo que el nuestro,

translation.en: we ask you to join with us, Uhtred, in our alliance.
translation.es: le pedimos que se una a nosotrosen nuestra alianza, Uhtred.

translation.en: Stand against the tyrant.
I'm heartsick of battles.
What has become of the warrior? Do you no longer yearn for Valhalla?
translation.es: ¿Qué ha sido del guerrero?¿Ya no añora el Valhalla?

translation.en: Do you know the prophecy, Uhtred?
The ancient prophecy of my people?
All of Britain will unite against the Saxons,
translation.es: Toda Gran Bretañase unirá contra los sajones,

translation.en: push them into the Kentish sea,
translation.es: los empujará al mar de Kent

translation.en: return the feals to the line of Arthur.
translation.es: y devolverá a los aliadosa las filas de Arturo.

translation.en: [Anlaf] There. The vision of an old man.
translation.es: Esa es la visión de un anciano.

translation.en: -So it must be true. -We Northumbrians also have a prophecy.
translation.es: - Debe ser cierto.- Northumbria también tiene una profecía.

translation.en: "Seven kings must die."
That holds no fear.
Each man here has a son to take his place.
translation.es: Tenemos hijos que tomarán nuestro lugar.

translation.en: [Owain] Seven kings die, seven will, in that moment, be made.
translation.es: Si mueren siete reyes,se harán otros siete en ese momento.

translation.en: [Anlaf] It's true.
If you make a child, your kingdom stands beyond you.
translation.es: Si tienes un hijo,tu reino vivirá más que tú.

translation.en: A kingdom ravaged by war, yes.
translation.es: Un reino devastado por la guerra.

translation.en: [Constantin] Then there is another way to consider.
translation.es: Pero hay otra forma de verlo.

translation.en: If you wish to save many from bloodshed.
Kill one man only.
Kill the king who has attacked us all.
translation.es: Mate al rey que nos atacó a todos.

translation.en: Return to him in… supplication.
Seize the moment.
Save many lives by simply taking one.
translation.es: Salvaría muchas vidas con solo tomar una.

translation.en: [Anlaf] The alternative, of course, is war.
Seven kings against one.
If Aethelstan wanted to unite the tribes of Britain,
translation.es: Si Aethelstan quería unira las tribus de Gran Bretaña,

translation.en: he has succeeded.
[Anlaf] Why do you seek us here?
Your part is to keep Winchester aroused.
You let Uhtred go free. Why?
I sent him away.
To kill your friend, the king.
translation.es: Para matar a tu amigo, el rey.

translation.en: -Well, he will be killed in the attempt. -[woman chuckles]
Uhtred has skills you do not.
translation.es: Uhtred es más hábil que tú.

translation.en: He attacks Aethelstan. Aethelstan attacks him.
translation.es: Ataca a Aethelstan.Aethelstan lo ataca a él.

translation.en: It barely matters.
Either way, we face in battle men whose spirits have been broken.
translation.es: Como sea, enfrentaremosa hombres con la moral baja.

translation.en: Ingilmundr, go to the West. The time is near.
translation.es: Ingilmundr, ve al oeste.Se acerca el momento.

translation.en: Astrid, watch our friends in Northumbria.
translation.es: Astrid, cuida a los amigos en Northumbria.

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I did not think I would see you again.
translation.es: Pensé que no volvería a verte.

translation.en: Lord King.
In the name of my son, I beg forgiveness.
translation.es: En nombre de mi hijo, te pido perdón.

translation.en: Spare him.
Let me kneel to you.
Then I lift your banishment.
Give me a sword and then leave us.
Go on, then.
Do it.
I swear this on my son's life.
translation.es: Lo juro por la vida de mi hijo.

translation.en: Hear this as an oath.
Ingilmundr is a spy.
He's working with Anlaf to ally British kings against you.
translation.es: Conspira con Anlaf y los reyes británicos.

translation.en: -Lies. -It is true. I saw him in Shetland.
translation.es: - Mentiras.- No, lo vi en Shetland.

translation.en: He told Anlaf's warriors to track me. They tried to turn me--
translation.es: Pidió que me rastrearany trató de reclutarme…

translation.en: No! [grunts]
-He is in Thelwael with your son! -He told them things of you.
translation.es: - ¡Está en Thelwael con tu hijo!- Les dijo cosas sobre ti.

translation.en: He still follows my gods.
For now, you have an advantage.
Ingilmundr does not know he has been discovered.
translation.es: Ingilmundr no sabe que lo descubrieron.

translation.en: [Aethelstan] No, he would not betray me. If anything, I have betrayed him.
translation.es: No me traicionaría.En todo caso, yo lo traicioné a él.

translation.en: -No. -He is a man of God, and I am a sinner!
translation.es: - No.- ¡Es un creyente y yo soy un pecador!

translation.en: He has convinced you of this to provoke your campaign.
translation.es: Te convenció de esopara provocar tu campaña.

translation.en: -To unite your enemies. -No!
Aethelstan, please see this. This alliance he has gathered is too large.
translation.es: Aethelstan, por favor.Su alianza es demasiado grande.

translation.en: -Your lands will be overrun. -No! You lie!
This is all lies!
Aethelstan, please hear me.
Why would I lie to you?
-Get out. -Aethelstan--
Get out. Get from my sight! Guards!
-[door opens] -Take him!
[guard] You dog! On your way.
[Sihtric] We search every forest, every valley.
[Finan] And here he is, back in the lap of luxury.
translation.es: Y aquí está, dándose la buena vida.

translation.en: We heard you needed us.
Truly the gods smiled at me to give me such friends.
translation.es: Los dioses me sonrieron con estos amigos.

translation.en: [Finan] Let's find ourselves an alehouse, make a plan.
translation.es: Busquemos una tabernay pensemos en un plan.

translation.en: -Who told you I was here? -[Sihtric] She said you called for us.
translation.es: - ¿Quién les dijo?- Dijo que nos llamó.

translation.en: -Did you not send for us, Lord? -She said you needed us. And requested a guard.
translation.es: - ¿No nos llamó?- Dijo que pidió una guardia.

translation.en: Danish girl, serves in Aethelstan's court.
translation.es: La danesa de la corte de Aethelstan.

translation.en: Finan, I sent no word.
No command for you to leave Bebbanburg.
-[Sihtric] Stay here and guard the gates. -[man] Yes, Lord.
translation.es: - Quédate y vigila las puertas.- Sí, señor.

translation.en: [Uhtred] Wolf-Warriors.
[Uhtred] This is Anlaf's doing.
[Finan] Ingrith!
[Sihtric] Lord, where are they all?
-[Uhtred] Eadgifu? -Uhtred.
What happened?
[Eadgifu] When news reached us of the attack and torture here,
translation.es: Cuando supimos del ataque y la tortura,

translation.en: the abbess sent us to help the injured.
translation.es: la abadesa nos envióa ayudar a los heridos.

translation.en: But we cannot get to the injured.
Where… Where is she? Where's my wife?
"Seven kings must die," Lord.
"Seven kings
and the woman you love."
Ingrith!
-No. Ingrith! -Every man is to help move it.
You, up above.
-[Finan] Can anyone hear me? -[Uhtred] Watch for signs of Anlaf's men.
translation.es: - ¿Alguien me oye?- ¡Busca a los hombres de Anlaf!

translation.en: We tried to help, but all we could do was comfort them.
translation.es: No pudimos hacer más que consolarlos.

translation.en: Uhtred, Ingrith said they threatened to return.
translation.es: Uhtred, Ingrith me dijoque amenazaron con regresar.

translation.en: -We must secure ourselves. -Not until we rescue those within.
When did you speak last?
About three days ago.
-[Finan] Get the rope up there! -[man grunts]
[Finan] Come on!
[Finan] Pull!
[Finan] Pull!
Pull!
Pull!
Now!
[in anguish] No!
[Uhtred] I brought this on them.
What they suffered is on Anlaf's account.
translation.es: Lo que sufrieron fue por culpa de Anlaf.

translation.en: You cannot let this break you.
translation.es: No deje que esto lo derrote.

translation.en: We are broken.
We have no allies. We're lost.
Then we must find the courage to defend Northumbria from their return.
translation.es: Encontremos el valorpara defender a Northumbria.

translation.en: If we endure and keep them at siege,
translation.es: Si aguantamos el asedio un tiempo,

translation.en: we will give those in other parts of England time to prepare.
translation.es: daremos tiempo a que otros se preparen.

translation.en: Whatever we suffer protects those we are apart from.
translation.es: Nuestro sufrimientoprotegerá a los que queremos.

translation.en: [Sihtric] She's right, Lord.
Osbert can cross the Irish Sea, get to--
translation.es: Osbert cruzará el mar de Irlanda a…

translation.en: The Irish Sea?
We must find the fastest horses. I think Anlaf is hoping to turn all eyes here.
translation.es: Vamos en los caballos más rápidos.Creo que Anlaf quiere llamar la atención.

translation.en: To lure Aethelstan.
But they will land where they have men. Ingilmundr holds a garrison in the Wirral.
translation.es: Pero atracarán donde tienen hombres.Ingilmundr tiene una guarnición en Wirral.

translation.en: With… With our sons.
[Osbert] Something's underway.
-[men shouting] -[Osbert] Get in the cart.
Those of you with swords to your throats face a decision.
translation.es: Aquellos con espadas en la gargantase enfrentan a una decisión.

translation.en: A thousand ships are heading towards these shores.
translation.es: Mil barcos se dirigen hacia estas costas.

translation.en: Some have already landed.
Within a week, Saxon boroughs will be overrun.
translation.es: En una semana,invadirán los distritos sajones.

translation.en: Join us and fight the tyrant Aethelstan,
translation.es: Únanse y luchemoscontra el tirano Aethelstan

translation.en: or die.
For King Ed--
-[Osbert] Keep still. -[man] This way!
We saw them, but they got away.
-There. Far away. -Thank you.
[woman] Yes, my lord.
[Sihtric] No word from Thelwael, Lord.
Lord?
Do we finally face defeat?
All the warrior kings that I've known, Ubba, Cnut, Bloodhair,
translation.es: Todos los reyes guerreros que he conocido:Ubba, Canuto, Bloodhair…

translation.en: all have faced defeat in the end and have taken others with them.
translation.es: han enfrentado la derrotay han arrastrado a otros.

translation.en: The fight was always coming, Lord. No warrior dies a peaceful death.
translation.es: La lucha era inevitable, señor.Ningún guerrero muere en paz.

translation.en: She saw it all. "Seven kings must die."
translation.es: Ella lo vio todo:"Siete reyes deben morir".

translation.en: We have hope.
In your heart, you never wanted to be a king.
translation.es: En su corazón, nunca quiso ser rey.

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Have those fleeing heard anything of my son?
translation.es: ¿Los que huyen saben algo de mi hijo?

translation.en: Then until I know for sure, he is alive.
translation.es: Hasta no estar segura, él sigue vivo.

translation.en: And if conquest is easy, perhaps Anlaf may be satisfied with Mercia.
translation.es: Y si la conquista es fácil,Mercia podría ser suficiente para Anlaf.

translation.en: -It is fertile-- -[Uhtred] He will not be satisfied.
They come Viking now to extinguish an idea of England.
translation.es: Invadirán para extinguirla idea de Inglaterra.

translation.en: A dream unites a people who once sought to kill each other.
translation.es: Solo un sueño une a un puebloque solía aniquilarse.

translation.en: Without it, we go back into an age of darkness.
translation.es: Sin él, volveremos a una era de oscuridad.

translation.en: We have both lost so much.
But I ask myself…
am I alive?
Can you feel it?
[Uhtred] You are alive.
So are you.
So we have hope.
[Uhtred] Edmund?
Osbert?
[Eadgifu] Edmund?
I came seeking Ingilmundr.
To prove that you had lied to me.
But you had not.
[Uhtred] We came to search for our sons.
translation.es: Vinimos a buscar a nuestros hijos.

translation.en: Bring out Osbert and Edmund.
[Uhtred] Osbert!
[Aethelstan] They hid themselves and were spared the massacre.
translation.es: Se escondierony se salvaron de la masacre.

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Lord King, you have my endless gratitude.
translation.es: Señor mío, tiene mi infinita gratitud.

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I've not been myself this past year, and truly, truly, I…
translation.es: No he sido yo mismo últimamente y…

translation.en: I pay for my sins.
I face a great alliance at Brunanburh.
translation.es: Me enfrento a una gran alianzaen Brunanburh.

translation.en: All regret is worthless.
Let us speak only of the fight to come.
translation.es: Hablemos de la lucha por venir.

translation.en: -Osbert, what have you learnt? -They've set up camp on high ground.
translation.es: - Osbert, ¿qué descubriste?- Acamparon en terreno elevado.

translation.en: And they have six armies.
Then seven armies shall meet at Brunanburh.
I do not want you to fight for me, Uhtred.
translation.es: No quiero que luches por mí.

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Trust I'm on your side-- -I know that.
translation.es: - Estoy de tu lado…- Lo sé.

translation.en: Save yourself.
Take your son to safety.
translation.es: Lleva a tu hijo a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: If I do not survive the battle, then succession will be secure.
translation.es: Si no sobrevivo a la batalla,la sucesión estará a salvo.

translation.en: You cannot fight this alliance alone. [Aethelstan] Yet I forbid you from taking part.
translation.es: - No puedes luchar solo.- Pero te prohíbo participar.

translation.en: Take him, Father Pyrlig. Please, take them all.
-I've dragged you all to this fate. -[Uhtred] Let us serve you.
translation.es: - Los arrastré a este destino.- Déjanos servirte.

translation.en: this is not a punishment.
I think we both know that it is.
translation.es: Creo que ambos sabemos que sí.

translation.en: [Uhtred] This is martyrdom.
He will not survive so great a number.
But we have been reprieved.
-God is telling us to get to safety. -Your god does not speak to me.
translation.es: - Dios dice que nos pongamos a salvo.- Su dios no me habla.

translation.en: It is not cowardly to spurn a battle that cannot be won.
translation.es: No es cobardehuir de una batalla imposible.

translation.en: It is.
However this prevails, I will have to know I walked away from danger.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase,sabré que hui del peligro.

translation.en: Your battles will come
when you become king.
King of where, Mother?
-We will fight with the shield wall. -No.
-Osbert, are you ready? -I've always been ready.
Pyrlig, you once told me that it was my destiny to save England.
translation.es: Pyrlig, una vez me dijisteque mi destino era salvar Inglaterra.

translation.en: Hadn't seen it quite like this, but then I'm not one for prophecies.
translation.es: No lo había visto así,pero no me gustan las profecías.

translation.en: [Eadgifu] What if your destiny is to protect Edmund?
translation.es: ¿Y si su destino es proteger a Edmund?

translation.en: Perhaps he is the one to unite England. He could be the king who was worthy.
translation.es: Quizá él unirá a Inglaterra.Podría ser digno de ser rey.

translation.en: No king will form England.
This is what I see now.
Not Edmund or Edward or Alfred. Not even Aethelstan.
translation.es: Ni Edmund, ni Eduardo, ni Alfred.Ni siquiera Aethelstan.

translation.en: Alfred's dream was of a united people.
translation.es: Alfred soñaba con un pueblo unido.

translation.en: And with these men, from all parts, I fought for it.
translation.es: Luché por ello con estos hombres.

translation.en: What if our destiny was not to form England,
translation.es: ¿Y si no hubiera que formar Inglaterra,

translation.en: but to form the English as one force?
translation.es: sino a los ingleses como una sola fuerza?

translation.en: Who better than a half Saxon, half Dane to lead men from divided places?
translation.es: ¿Quién mejor que un medio sajóny medio danés para unir un ejército así?

translation.en: [Uhtred] We go!
I don't have to call myself English, do I?
-[grunting] -[yelling]
To hear that, you'd think they'd won already.
[Uhtred] We should make our way. If this is to work, we need to be on the front line.
translation.es: Hay que avanzar. Para que funcione,debemos estar en primera fila.

translation.en: -We'll aim for their left side. -Why?
translation.es: - Apunta a su lado izquierdo.- ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Why the left?
Weaker. Most men fight with the sword in their right hand.
translation.es: Es más débil.La mayoría empuña con la derecha.

translation.en: I've fought with Uhtred many times. Trust he will find a way.
translation.es: He peleado con Uhtred muchas veces.Lo resolverá.

translation.en: You.
Where did you find that?
I bought it in Aegelesburg for five pieces.
translation.es: La compré en Aegelesburg por cinco piezas.

translation.en: May I?
I will exchange it for this one.
It is worth much more, and it has a garnet.
translation.es: Vale mucho más y tiene un granate.

translation.en: When I say exchange, I mean you take that one, and I keep this one.
translation.es: Me refiero a que tomes esay yo me quedaré con esta.

translation.en: [Uhtred] I am no commander of yours.
I have no authority other than being a man who has fought in many battles.
translation.es: No tengo más autoridadque mi experiencia en muchas batallas.

translation.en: Some of you I have led before.
Today I stand with you as a simple soldier.
translation.es: Hoy estoy aquí como un simple soldado.

translation.en: But I ask that, on the field, you once again let me guide you.
translation.es: Pero les pidoque me dejen guiarlos otra vez.

translation.en: Our position on the hill is weak,
translation.es: La posición en la colina es débil,

translation.en: but the trees to our left give us an advantage the enemy will not see.
translation.es: pero los árboles a la izquierdanos dan una ventaja inesperada.

translation.en: We can defeat them
if we stay united.
-This is one way to clear the ale. -Smell of a thousand armpits.
translation.es: - Qué buen remedio para la resaca.- Huele a mil axilas.

translation.en: [Finan] Aye. Maybe they smelled us and ran away.
translation.es: Sí, tal vez nos olieron y huyeron.

translation.en: -[Sihtric] Maybe. -[Finan] Who touched my arse?
Oh my God!
[soldier] Jesus!
Rather a lot of them, isn't there?
[Edmund] Uhtred?
-How do we face this? -You see these bags?
Give them to the men on the front line. Go.
translation.es: Dáselas a los hombres del frente.

translation.en: [Uhtred] Do not raise your shield until you have to.
Stay at ease. Stay relaxed.
-And do not show them we are unsettled. -[Finan] Lord!
translation.es: - Y no les demuestren miedo.- ¡Señor! Ya llegó.

translation.en: [Anlaf] Here he comes. The tyrant himself.
translation.es: Aquí viene el tirano en persona.

translation.en: [Uhtred] Is it done?
-Get back as far as you can. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Ve lo más lejos posible.- Sí.

translation.en: [commander] Shield wall!
-Are we ready, arselings? -[soldiers] Yeah!
I have taken their confessions.
When I ask you to give ground,
do it.
When you see the trees in front of you, it will be time.
translation.es: Cuando vean los árboles enfrente,será el momento.

translation.en: Do you think this will work?
If it does not, we will not be here to see it.
translation.es: Si no, no estaremos para verlo.

translation.en: Trust me.
And follow.
Shield wall!
Shield!
Wall!
Step back!
Back!
They retreat?
Even before we engage?
-Step back! -[Anlaf] They know they have lost already.
Let's enjoy it.
-[commander] Forward! -[soldiers grunt]
I thank God, who I serve with pure conscience.
translation.es: Agradezco a Dios,a quien sirvo con conciencia pura.

translation.en: God hath not given us a spirit of fear, but of power…
translation.es: Dios no nos dio un espíritude miedo, sino de poder,

translation.en: -[soldiers grunt] -…and of sound mind!
translation.es: de amor y de mente sana.

translation.en: [Finan] Amen.
[Uhtred] Step back!
Brace!
[commander] Re-form! Charge!
Saxon bastards!
[Uhtred] Pyrlig!
No! [echoes]
Pyrlig!
-Two paces! One pace! -Mm-hmm.
-On my command! -[Finan] Let's hope this works!
translation.es: ¡Dos pasos! ¡Un paso! ¡A mi orden! ¡Esperemos que funcione!

translation.en: Two paces back!
Back!
Step back!
One pace back!
[Anlaf] They back off. We have them.
-Find the king! -[Anlaf] Find the king!
Step back!
[Sihtric] Go backwards!
For Shetland!
For Orkney!
Step back!
-Keep going! -Keep going!
[Finan] Back!
Protect the line! Protect the line!
Step back!
[Finan] They'll overrun us if we keep giving ground!
What are they doing along the flank?
[Constantin] Send a message that Aethelstan is in front of us!
Step back!
Step back!
[Finan] The line's turning, Lord. We're coming around!
translation.es: La línea está girando, señor.¡Se está doblando!

translation.en: Aethelstan is on the Scots' line, Lord.
Swine wedge!
Step back!
[Anlaf] Swine wedge!
[Constantin] Anlaf! Stop!
Push forward!
They're going for Aethelstan!
Step back!
Back!
The wall will not hold!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan, hold the line!
-[Finan] How much longer, Lord? -[Uhtred] We're almost there.
They're breaking through Aethelstan's line, Lord!
[Finan] We can't hold!
Step back!
Push forward!
[Ingilmundr] Lord!
Lord.
[Hywel] Protect the king!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan!
[Finan] Lord, trees!
We've turned them, Lord! We've turned the line.
-[Uhtred] Give the signal! -[runner] Yes, Lord.
-Something's not right. -[Domnal] We've been turned around!
[runner] Make way! Make way!
Lord Uhtred orders the signal.
Attack!
Behind!
Hunt down their kings!
It's a trap!
[Shetland] My son!
No!
Guards!
Fall back! Fall back!
Scots! Fall back!
Aethelstan!
Pyrlig?
[Finan] Five kings escaped the field that day,
translation.es: Cinco reyes escaparon del campo ese día,

translation.en: but their sons,
Strathclyde, and Scotland, did not.
translation.es: Strathclyde y Escocia, no lo hicieron.

translation.en: [Constantin] Each man here has left behind an heir.
translation.es: Cada hombre aquí ha perdido a un heredero.

translation.en: We wait.
Then attack those leaving the field and return for our kin.
translation.es: Los atacaremos al retirarsey volveremos por los nuestros.

translation.en: [Shetland] Do not be any more foolish, Anlaf.
[Anlaf] Shetland?
No more death.
[Anlaf] Orkney, we need to fight!
What is there to fight for?
I need a ship to get back to Irland.
translation.es: Necesito navegar de vuelta a Irlanda.

translation.en: You?
[Sihtric] Lord!
[Finan] Uhtred!
Uhtred!
[Sihtric] Finan! Finan!
[Aethelstan] Was any of it real?
Tell me the truth.
When you find yourself before God, you will have confessed.
translation.es: Cuando estés frente a Dios,ya habrás confesado.

translation.en: I grew fond of you.
-But my love for my people prevailed. -I chose you over my people.
translation.es: - Pero pudo más el amor por mi gente.- Te elegí sobre mi gente.

translation.en: Perhaps my gods are stronger than yours.
translation.es: Mis dioses son más fuertes que los suyos.

translation.en: Then why am I living…
and you about to die?
Only fools try to understand destiny.
translation.es: Solo un tontotrata de entender el destino.

translation.en: Did my son survive? Yes.
[Osbert] And Bebbanburg is ours again.
-We will rebuild in stone. -[Eadgifu] There is so much future.
translation.es: - La reconstruiremos en piedra.- Tenemos un gran futuro.

translation.en: Stay with us, Uhtred.
-What of the enemy? -[Finan] The victory is ours.
Five sons of kings lay dead upon the battlefield.
translation.es: Cinco hijos de reyesyacían muertos en el campo de batalla.

translation.en: -Five kings that will never be crowned. -[Finan] "Seven kings must die."
translation.es: - Cinco que nunca se coronarán.- "Siete reyes deben morir".

translation.en: The prophecy was wrong, Lord.
With Edward of Wessex, it makes six.
translation.es: Con Eduardo de Wessex, son seis.

translation.en: Am I to be the seventh?
I have told the chroniclers to write of your victory, Uhtred.
translation.es: Pedí a los cronistasque escribieran sobre tu victoria.

translation.en: I have no wish to be written into your history.
translation.es: No deseo ser parte de tu historia.

translation.en: I want only to be honored in the feast hall for standing by an oath.
translation.es: Solo quiero que me honrenen el salón por cumplir mi juramento.

translation.en: Uhtred, you did not just stand by me.
translation.es: Uhtred, no solo estuviste a mi lado.

translation.en: You stood for me.
You led where I could not.
translation.es: Tomaste las riendas cuando no pude.

translation.en: And you forgave me
when I was unforgivable.
You saved the hope of England.
Now in time, it may yet happen.
I said that…
if you proved yourself to be the rightful king,
translation.es: si demostrabas ser el rey legítimo,

translation.en: I would swear Northumbria to you.
Men have died fighting under the name of the English.
translation.es: Muchos murieronluchando bajo el nombre de los ingleses.

translation.en: To honor them, England should be formed.
But I have one condition.
You must make an oath never to marry.
translation.es: Debes jurar que nunca te casarás.

translation.en: No heirs.
So your brother Edmund can take the throne unchallenged.
translation.es: Para que tu hermano Edmundpueda tomar el trono.

translation.en: Thank you.
This oath I shall swear.
Then we submit to you as our king.
translation.es: Nos sometemos a ti como nuestro rey.

translation.en: Which makes you ruler of Wessex, Mercia, East Anglia,
translation.es: Lo que te hace gobernantede Wessex, Mercia, Anglia Oriental…

translation.en: and Northumbria.
And I call my lands
England.
Long live the king!
[all] Long live the king.
[Uhtred] Long live the King of England.
translation.es: Larga vida al rey de Inglaterra.

translation.en: Return to your chamber, Lord.
Do not grieve for me.
It was always written that I would fall in battle.
translation.es: Estaba escrito que moriría en batalla.

translation.en: [Finan] You're not gonna die, Lord.
-I would go first, and I'm still alive… -[distant cheering]
translation.es: Dije que moriría primeroy sigo vivo, así que…

translation.en: So,
destiny is all.
[Finan] Did seven kings die?
The chronicles do not record if my lord Uhtred survived.
translation.es: Las crónicas no registransi mi señor Uhtred sobrevivió,

translation.en: But those like me, who knew him,
translation.es: pero quienes lo conocieron como yo

translation.en: recognize him as the greatest warrior of our age,
translation.es: lo recuerdan como el mejorguerrero de nuestra época

translation.en: and a man who made a kingdom.
translation.es: y un hombre que creó un reino.
